name: DungeonRunner
description:
[This game is still a very early prototype and I will be posting somewhat regular updates]

You will have to fight your way out of the maze of dastardly dungeons of Horowath.  Each room holds a weapon that will expire soon after you pick it up, so to beat the game you have to be nimble and quick while running and gunning all the enemies and even some bosses. As the powerful main character, Jaques Jacobs, you will run through the dungeon with expiring weapons and enemies to deal with.

Cover Image done by The Ultimate Sequin
